name: Tak: The Great Juju Challenge
description:
Once each generation, the world's mightiest heroes, fiercest warriors, and most powerful athletes gather together to compete in The Great Juju Challenge. Play as both Tak and Lok in the fight for the championship and the future of the Pupanunu people.

• Play as both Tak and Lok in all-new 3D co-op adventure!
• Upgrade your Juju Magic to make your spells and abilities even more powerful!
• Use the DS Touch Screen and microphone for tons of replayable mini-games!
• Race to the finish line in an all-new derby mode!
• Unlock new secrets like the Shaman puzzle game!
